title.narrative: N/A
N/A
Program supporting reforms to increase productivity in Peru
Programa de acompañamiento a las reformas para incrementar la productividad en el Perú

description.narrative: El objetivo de la serie programática es apoyar al GOP a incrementar la productividad de la economía. Los objetivos específicos consisten en: (i) mejorar la calidad del factor productivo laboral; y (ii) mejorar laspolíticas públicas laboral, productiva y tributaria para promover una mayor eficiencia en la asignación de los factoresproductivos.

The objective of the programmatic series is to support the Peruvian government's efforts to increase the productivity of the economy. The specific objectives are to: (i) improve the quality of the labor factor of production, and (ii) improve labor, production, and tax policies to foster greater efficiency in the allocation of factors of production
Commitment in fourth quarter of 2018
Disbursement in first quarter of 2019
Interest repayment in fourth quarter of 2019
Interest repayment in fourth quarter of 2020
Interest repayment in second quarter of 2019
Interest repayment in second quarter of 2020
Interest repayment in second quarter of 2021
